Click here to learn more about Evonik from our employees This position is responsible for conducting analytical and performance testing of formulations, contributing to pharmaceutical method development, and/or analytical support of GxP manufacturing activities. The methods developed are used to characterize and compare especially products in the area of complex paraenteral drug delivery systems including polymeric microparticles, nanoparticles, nano-suspensions, liposomes and lipid based nanoparticles.  The position may include aspects of method development, specification development and justification, method transfers, stability assessment, GLP characterization, and method qualifications as well as new ways of measuring parameters in the process of formulation development as well as appropriate documentation in the highly regulated pharmaceutical industry (drug product development).
